description: Sawyer`s Salamence is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Shelgon. It evolved sometime before the start of the Kalos League and Ash`s battle against Sawyer in XYZ 13. It was revealed in the Kalos League semi-finals as Sawyer`s fourth Pok√©mon and it first faced off against Ash`s Noivern. The semi-final battle was quick but well balanced. The two ended up knocking each other out in a draw.
name: Bohmander (Shouta)
